definition: "silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom
black hat (worn by feudal official)/fig. official post
gauze hat/(fig.) job as an official
lit. to lose one's black hat/to be sacked from an official post

sentences.english: There are two kinds of Air-Jet Texturing method, with or without heat-setting.
sentences.chinese: 空氣變形紗加工以是否帶有定型熱箱分爲兩大類。

sentences.english: The ribbed crochet raises up peaks and valleys in the yarn.
sentences.chinese: 肋手鉤紗提出在波峯和波谷。

sentences.english: Four-ply yarn construction offers a heavier weight for easy insulation.
sentences.chinese: 四股紗建設提供了一個方便絕緣的重量較重。

sentences.english: Trademark an fiber or the lightweight crease resistant fabric made with Orlon yarns .
sentences.chinese: 用晴綸紗製造的重量很輕的抗褶皺的纖維。

sentences.english: Since the fighting hundreds of spot color clothes, cut a piece of yarn pro-black hat.
sentences.chinese: 斑衣自鬥百家彩，烏帽親裁一幅紗。

sentences.english: The windows were covered with (screens) to keep out insects.
sentences.chinese: 窗戶上蓋了一層紗用來防昆蟲。

sentences.english: Cotton and rayon yarns are most often sized with water-insoluble starches.
sentences.chinese: 棉和人造絲紗多用不溶於水的澱粉上漿。

sentences.english: In a warehouse, modern machines spin wool into yarn.
sentences.chinese: 在一個倉庫中，現代的機器將羊毛卷成紗。

sentences.english: Variation in twist level in the yarn.
sentences.chinese: 紗捻度標準發生變化，差異大。

sentences.english: The creations of Saeko Tagagi have sensitive emotions and use unique techniques.
sentences.chinese: 紗惠子的創作，擁有細膩的感情與獨特的技巧。

sentences.english: The nuns make their habits which consist of a dress, a cincture and a veil.
sentences.chinese: 修女使他們的習慣，其中包括衣服，一個帶和麪紗。

sentences.english: It waits to be lifted in the night.
sentences.chinese: 這面紗期待着在夜間卸去。

sentences.english: He asked another woman in the community to throw a veil over the lady.
sentences.chinese: 他請公社裏的另一個婦女向那位女士拋去一塊麪紗。

sentences.english: Also, the various jacquard rules of filling of yarn-pressing form and its structure effect are investigated.
sentences.chinese: 還比較了各種賈卡壓紗組織的墊紗規律和結構效應。

sentences.english: Also, it is more uniform but somewhat weaker than ring- spun yarn.
sentences.chinese: 另外，無捻紗比環錠紗條幹更均勻，強度則略低。

definition: enclosing frame made of bamboo, wire etc/cage/basket/steamer basket/to cover/to cage/to embrace/to manipulate through trickery

the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)
